review: Have gaps between teeth . Went for a consultation. Was very confused initially but Harsha mam explained me the best treatment possible and I went for aligners . undergoing treatment . Can already see my teeth changes and I'm happy .my self confidence has improved a lot .thank you Dr Harsha mam

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I had gaps between my front teeth . I have visited the doctor for my gaps to be closed . Dr Harsha was very kind and she explained me about Aligners. She also gave me the all possible alternative options and she suggested me the best treatment outcome will be with aligners .Thank you so much Dr Harsha mam .
Visited the dental clinic for my gums problem.My gums are red and swollen and Dr harsha mam told me about the necessary gum surgery to be done .Thank you Dr Harsha mam .Thank you partha Dental .
Dr Harsha mam explained me about the reason for my yellowish teeth and suggested me smile designing with zirconia crowns.  Very happy and satisfied with the treatment.  Thank you Dr Harsha mam.

review: Have bleeding from the gums since past 6 months . visited Dr Harsha for the issue . She suggested me Laser treatment for the gums . Treatment was successful. Thank you Dr Harsha for the treatment.

Happened to visit Dr Harsha for my yellowish teeth. She examined me through suggested me the needed investigations , went through it and then I have been explained about the various treatment options .I chose veeners for my smile correction. My treatment was done with precise and accurate results. Thank you so much Dr Harsha .

review: I have Visited the Partha clinic for severe acne issues Dr Harsha mam explained me about the procedure of mesotherapy that needs to be done.Went through few sessions Having amazing results.Thank you so much Harsha mam for the treatment.

Visited partha dental for toothache ,Dr.harsha suggested for RCT ,thanks to Dr.Harsha for the treatment am very much satisfied with the service provided.i strongly recommend to my friends and family members
